name: YogaVibes
tag_list: online-yoga-videos, online-yoga-class, yoga, vinyasa, flow, anusara, ashtanga, streaming-videos
overview:
From yoga teachers to avid yoga practitioners, from just discovering yoga to looking to gain a competitive athletic edge, YogaVibes believes in spreading yoga’s reach and touching people’s lives with yoga. We believe in the pure joy of moving your body and the radical healing powers yoga can manifest. We seek to build and support a yoga community where all will feel welcome, safe, and personally challenged.

For us, nothing’s better than going to a rock your socks off yoga class, but we’ve also experienced that wrenching feeling of just not being able to get there. (Work! Traffic! Screaming toddler! Hangnail!) That’s why we created YogaVibes - to allow everyone to enjoy the authenticity of a yoga class captured in a real studio (no retakes!) with real students (they may fall down!). Wherever you are and whenever you feel that yoga urge, YogaVibes has a class to scratch your itch.

Let’s be real - most of us can’t afford to participate in all the workshops and retreats that whisper to us from our email inbox or the snazzy flier on our local studio’s wall. Now you can practice and learn yoga online with some of the most amazing teachers in the world - from the comfort of your own living room, wearing your favorite (but to be honest, maybe not ok to leave the house) yoga pants.
